items.storedescription: The Yellow Contour is very versatile tool for reaching out of the way places. One of our most popular tools since we brought it out 3 years ago. MADE IN THE USA

You have been cutting your Teflon cards to this shape for years. The Gold EZ Reach Corner Tool now offers a pre-cut 6" Gold Teflon to reach all of those corners. The Gold EZ Reach Corner Tool also makes sliding film into the door gaskets a breeze. This is one of our most popular installation tools. ORIGINAL SHAPE/ 3 CORNERS MADE IN THE USA

You have been cutting your Teflon cards to this shape for years. The Gold EZ Reach Ultra Corner Tool now offers a pre-cut 6" Gold Teflon to reach all of those corners. The Gold EZ Reach Ultra Corner Tool also makes sliding film into the door gaskets a breeze.Â  This is one of our most popular Installation Tools. Â NEW SHAPEMADE IN THEUSA

items.storedescription: The Automotive Bull Dozer will help you reach into the tightest rear deck area with ease. The Automotive Bull Dozer has plenty of reach and a rubber squeegee tip.

The Flat Glass Bull Dozer is like the Automotive Bull Dozer, this unit helps you reach hard to reach areas on a flat glass install. Longer ribs on the Flat Glass Bull Dozer increase the stiffness. The soft rubber tip on the end insures you won't end up with any scratches on the film.
The ProToolsNow Green Tail Fin is designed to help with those problematic third brake lights and other tight spots. The Green Tail Fin is also great for paint protection installs. Made In The USA
The Green Contour is a softer version of the popular Yellow Contour. The Green Contour is great for paint protection installs. MADE IN THE USA

From APlusOne the Fusion Turbo Pro Line is available in 3”, 5” & 8” versions that are pre-molded to size with optional 3/4” (white) or 1 ½” (gray) diameter handles. The Turbo Pro, an injected molded tool infused with three slip agents that help the tool slide across surfaces easier. The main slip agent is the “migratory” agent that positions its self at the surface of the tool to lubricate the working part. The handles are also unique to the industry due to being specifically engineered with tighter tolerances and wider prongs that create a tighter fit on the Pro Turbo body which ensures the handle doesn’t slip off during use. The Yellow Turbo (85 durometer) is great for installing vinyl applications & areas that require more pressure.

items.storedescription: The ProToolsNow Contour Peach uniquely contoured card is an installer favorite. The peach formulation adds extra slip the contour you already love. The specially formulated material gives Peach Contour extra slip to glide smoothly. All edges are polished to help avoid scratching. Do yourself a favor and add this card to your tool kit. You'll be glad you did.

NEW! The Yellow Quick Foot will help you reach the hard to reach places that drive you crazy. Use the edge of the handle like a Chizler to  clean those problem decals off with ease. The Yellow Quick Foot is sure to make your installs easier.  MADE IN THE USA

The ProToolsNow Blue Quick Foot will help you reach the hard to reach places that drive you crazy. Use the edge of the handle like a Chizler to  clean those problem decals off with ease. The Blue Quick Foot is sure to make your installs easier.

The ProToolsNow White Quick Foot will help you reach the hard to reach places that drive you crazy. Use the edge of the handle like a Chizler to clean those problem decals off with ease. The ProToolsNow White Quick Foot is sure to make your installs easier.

items.storedescription: ProToolsNow Yellow Smart Card Mini are a contemporary version of the traditional Chizler or Plastic Razor Blade but better because they are wider and have a more comfortable grip and thin edge. Made In The USA
items.outofstockbehavior: Disallow back orders but display out-of-stock message

items.storedescription: The ProToolsNow Platinum EZ Reach Corner Tool (Redesigned) is a 1/4 millimeter thicker and slightly more rigid than the original Platinum version. As before, the unique design of the EZ Reach provides installers access to difficult installation areas. Try it for yourself, and see why most installers prefer the Platinum EZ Reach over the Gold EZ Reach.

The new EZ Wing Squeegee Reach Tool offers all of the benefits of a traditional triangle squeegee tool, but offers some new features as well that you will love. The unique Chizler tip that enables you to flip it over to Chizel out those stubborn creases or dust spots. The second feature of the new EZ Wing is the increased stiffness across the nose of the tool. This will allow you to apply more pressure out at the tip in those situations where you are reaching into a tight spot. The last, and most exciting, new feature of the EZ Wing is the integration of Control Contour Technology (CCT). This technology is found in the slightly curved main edge of the EZ Wing. The curved edge is designed to enable the tool to encourage a finger or bubble to disperse outward, which reduces the likelihood of a crease.

The ProToolsNow EZ Wing Peach features a new proprietary blend of ingredients that enable it to conform when it needs to and be stiff when required. It also slides easily on film which will decrease the likelihood of any scratching while using this tool.

The Platinum EZ Reach Ultra Corner Tool is a new harder version of the popular Gold Easy Reach Ultra Corner Tool. You need to try it for yourself! Many tint installers prefer the Platinum to the Gold!MADE IN THE USA
items.storedisplayname2: Platinum EZ Reach Ultra Corner Tool

items.storedescription: The Stroke Doctor is engineered to make difficult to reach installations much easier to master. Because of the long handle with a cushioned grip and the wide squeegee blade, you will be able to apply more pressure. This enables you to remove more solution per stroke.  Made In The USA

The ProToolsNow White Quick Fix is a cross between a Bondo and a Diamond Tip. The two ribs across the middle make the card easier to grip, enabling installers to force out more water. The angled design makes this tool particularly well suited for tight fitting corners.

The ProToolsNow Yellow Quick Fix is a cross between a “Bondo” and a “Diamond Tip”. The two ribs across the middle make the card easier to grip, enabling installers to force out more water. The angled design makes this tool particularly well suited for tight fitting corners. ProToolsNow Yellow Quick Fix is the exact same hardness and texture as the Quick Fix White and Quick Fix Black.

The Platinum Contour gives you the same great installation benefits as the Yellow Contour only its stiffer allowing you to push more water out.  The unique tear drop shape allows you to get into those hard to reach corners. MADE IN THEUSA

Our Yellow Turbo is the original formulation. The Yellow Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications. The world would be a better place if everyone bought a yellow turbo. Made In The USA

The Green Turbo is a relatively softer durometer turbo which is great for installing  paint protection films and vinyl applications. The Green Turbo has the consistency of the Yellow Turbo but the flexibility of the Black Smoothee. Available in 3 1/2", 5 1/2" and 18 1/2" versions. Made In The USA

The Orange Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications.  The 3.5 inch Orange Turbo is a good size for squeegeeing smaller windows and paint protection film. It is slightly harder than the Yellow Turbo so it helps to eliminate more water. Made In The USA
The 4" Black Smoothee blade is a great initial prep tool for cleaning your glass before the install. This tool also does a fine job on those paint protection installation projects that you have.
Our Yellow Turbo is the original formulation. The Yellow Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications.  Made In The USA

The Basic Yellow Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications. The "Basic" is not made with our "Original Formulation". We have brought the Basic Turbo in to give our customers a choice in turbos. Made In The USA

The Green Turbo is a relatively softer durometer turbo which is great for installing  paint protection films and vinyl applications. The Green Turbo has the consistency of the Yellow Turbo but the flexibility of the Black Smoothee. Available in 3 1/2", 5 1/2" and 18 1/2" versions. Made In The USA
